title: スレッドの全てのメールを同時に開きたい
creator: t.saito.sugawara
content:
以前のサンダーバードでは出来ていた物と思いますが、 送信済トレイと受信トレイの同じスレッドの物全てを同時に開きたいのですが、どうすれば良いか教えてください。

IN ENGLISH I think this was possible in previous versions of Thunderbird, but I would like to open all items in the same thread in my Sent and Inbox at the same time. Can you tell me how to do this?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/144.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Windows　11;kb_visits_prior:["/ja/kb/hyperlinks-in-messages-not-working"]

title: folder filter problem
creator: billboyd09
content:
the problem is that when I receive an email it goes straight to delete folder there is no where I can set the filters to filter of my choosing, I have lost losing all in coming mails I am talking with telstra as one page said it is an IMAP problem in that it just removes emails for no reason but in your problems page it says I can change the filter settings but in the settings there is no place to change filter rules 

I am getting very frustrated  after 6 hours and not getting anywhere  I have uninstall Thunderbird and reinstalled  but nothing changed  running win 11os  on desktop

what do you suggest
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;os:win 11
